snippet.title: Fighting Tiger 2018 GamePlay|All Levels
snippet.description:
#GamePlays#iOS#Android#Apps
This game is called Fighting Tiger. The objective of the game is to save your girlfriend from evil people.
Background story:

A guy named Gin is in a gang of really good fighters. Gin has a girlfriend who loves him a lot. He wants to leave the gang to be with his girl but the gang  doesn’t want that to happen. The gang then goes and capture Gin’s girl to encourage him to stay. There are two alternatives.
1.Rejoin the gang to prevent Gin’s girl from being killed.
2.Fight everyone in the gang including the boss. 
Fighters include ball throwers, bomb/fire throwers, women fighters, and a boss who’s very miserable in my opinion.
This has five whole stars on the Apple AppStore. 
If you are interested and want to play the game, then click the link below.Goodluck..your going to need it:
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/fighting-tiger/id983994307?mt=8


The game is also available on android but freezes a lot. If you still want to get it, click the link below which will take you to the google play store.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jiinfeng3d.bfrdemo&hl=en_US
